Documentation.heading: Welcome to the Shopify Product Bundler App ðŸš€
Documentation.introduction-1: The Shopify Product Bundler App is designed to help store owners create and manage product bundles with ease.
Documentation.introduction-2: By offering bundled products and discounts, you can increase your conversion rate and average order value.
Documentation.appFeatures: The Shopify Product Bundler App offers the following key features
Documentation.appFeatures-1: Easily create and manage product bundles by selecting multiple products, setting discount percentages, and assigning unique names.
Documentation.appFeatures-2: Define rules to generate bundles automatically based on product tags, collections, or price ranges.
Documentation.appFeatures-3: Display bundled products with visually distinguished components and show both the original and discounted prices.
Documentation.appFeatures-4: Gain insights into bundle performance with analytics such as total sales, popular bundles, and individual bundle performance.
Documentation.appFeatures-5: Enjoy a seamless experience on both desktop and mobile devices with our responsive user interface.
